verbose_text: IFN-gamma treatment led to a maximal induction of 2.8-fold, reached at 24 h, which then decreased to a stable level of 1.8 for as long as 72 h. Viral infection caused a steady increase in TNF-alpha mRNA expression which peaked at 2.4-fold at 72 h, and further time points would be required to verify whether this upward trend is maintained (XREF_FIG).
